name: Sonoma Valley Museum of Art
description: Contemporary and modern art museum one block from Sonoma's historic Town Plaza. Free admission on Wednesdays.
fullDescription: Contemporary and modern art museum one block from Sonoma's historic Town Plaza. Free admission on Wednesdays.
keywords: Sonoma Valley Museum of Art, SVMA, modern art, contemporary art, free Wednesdays, wine country, Sonoma Plaza
